io

Class ImportCSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.ImportCSV

  • public class ImportCSV
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    2.0 Description:
    Receive path to CSV file\s directory from user and validate the path.
    Use Commons Apache library to validate and import the CSV file in the desirable format.
    Create object "networks" which stores the records of the content. then, send it to ExportCSV class for further processing.
    Author:
    Kostia Kazakov & Yogev Rahamim

        Parameters:
        path - - User input for the CSV directory.
        Returns:
        Hashtable of networks from all the scans in path

                                                                     java.lang.String fileName)
        Parameters:
        path - - Directory path.
        fileName - - File name.
        Returns:
